snippet: Investors were relieved that Syria said it was ready to cooperate with a proposal to put its chemical weapons under international control.
abstract: Stock market rises and oil prices fall as prospect that United States would attack Syria appears to fade.
lead_paragraph: Investors were relieved that Syria said it was ready to cooperate with a proposal to put its chemical weapons under international control.

headline.main: Shares Gain and Oil Prices Slip on Hopes of Averting U.S. Strike in Syria
headline.print_headline: Shares Gain and Oil Prices Slip on Hopes of Averting U.S. Strike in Syria
